definition.datasource: if "$var.filename": ds.result = ("$var.filename").split("/")[-1].split(".")[0] + "/" else: ds.result = "" ds.result += "$(name)/" + str(ds.$(name)_fileprefix) + "%06i" % int(ds.$(name)_filestartnum) + str(ds.$(name)_filepostfix) + "://entry/$(__insname__)/detector" $datasources.$(name)_filedir $datasources.$(name)_fileprefix $datasources.$(name)_filepostfix $datasources.$(name)_filestartnum $datasources.$(name)_filesaving
